### The project should show: 

- Classical music is not boring
  - On average, it goes faster than Taylor Swift
  - It is happier (on average)
  
- Music is music!
  - Both Taylor Swift and Bach have the same elements, tempo, energy, key
  - All music (Contemporary and Classical) is the same!
